items.title: iOS Style Switches
items.description: Fully parametric and scalable style for HTML checkboxes which mimicks the appearance of iOS toggle switches. Created using vanilla CSS only.

items.title: Dynamic Buttons
items.description: A unique hover animation that makes buttons and other UI elements feel more physically interactive. Modeled after the hover states used in the Apple TV operating system.

items.title: Awesome Forms - Form Validation
items.description: A plug and play form validation script that uses HTML5 form validation attributes and JavaScript to provide a better user experience.
